product_name: Green Planet Maps Griffith Park! Map
long_description: The Griffith Park! map from Green Planet Maps makes it easy to explore the trails, zoo, observatory, attractions and activities of this beloved and iconic Southern California park. Waterproof, tear resistant map opens to 26 x 18.5 in. and folds down to 9.25 x 4 in. Copyright 2013; Green Planet Maps.
short_description: The Griffith Park! map from Green Planet Maps makes it easy to explore the trails, zoo, observatory, attractions and activities of this beloved and iconic Southern California park.
